CODE {
    ## 1. Setup Structure
    NEW DB db1;
    USE db1;
    
    ## 2. Define Schema (Auto-ID implied)
    NEW TABLE Users {
        Int: id, 
        String: name, 
        Int: age
    };
    
    ## 3. Enter Context
    USE Users;
    
    ## 4. Add Data (ID is auto-generated, so we provide Name and Age)
    ADD NEW {"Bob", 26};
    ADD NEW {"Alice", 30};
    ADD NEW {"Bob", 26};  ## Intentionally adding a duplicate for testing
    
    ## 5. Operations
    GET id = 1;
    FIND DUPLICATE;           ## Returns the second Bob
    REMOVE DUPLICATE;         ## Removes the second Bob
    
    REMOVE id = 1;            ## Bye bye first Bob
}
